ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money
ygData.msgSnippet: Depending on your level and gear,  you can pharm just about anything. King room in Sebilis (fungi tunic) 50 s, Sewers in CT (FT boots)60 s, Sol Ro tower
ygData.messageBody:
Depending on your level and gear,  you can pharm just about anything. King room in Sebilis (fungi tunic) 50's, Sewers in CT (FT boots)60's, Sol Ro tower (ornate) flagged, LDoN (I got a nice monk club the other night).
 
Go for big ticket items (FT3 boots) that people don't want to pharm. They go for $80k here. If you can get a group that wants to go often, you can split the plat between you rather then random for them.
 
Happy hunting!
 
Awulfie da bard
 
hello everyone.. I am new to this club but not EQ..  Lets talk about
makeing money.. I know to kill giants and farm silks and hides to
make money and you make god money doing this.. But how the heck do
people make 100k and more lol.. most i have had at one time is 5k..
If there is a better way to make pp  please let me know  thanks
